it.escape.core.client.controller

Class Relay

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.escape.core.client.controller.Relay
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RelayForRMI, RelayForSocket

    public abstract class Relay
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the methods to check the format of the messages, according to the type of input requested, such as checkCardsFormat(String s), checkYesNoFormat(String s). Moreover: The method relayMessage(String message) gives the connection the order to send a message. The method disconnectNow() gives the connection the order to terminate.
